title: Copy of Spanish Baroque painting botched by amateur restoration
title_page: Copy of Spanish Baroque painting botched by amateur restoration - BBC News
maintext: "In recent years, conservation-restoration professionals have been forced to emigrate or leave their professions due to a lack of opportunities," it added, warning that the industry was at "serious risk of disappearing" in Spain.
